alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sierra County through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chloride, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chloride and Portions of the Aldo Leopold Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
